mapper.select: select distinct district from field order by district
select f_name, f_num, price from field where district = #{sel} order by f_name desc
select phone from member where id=#{id}
select f_num,f_name,price from field where f_num=#{f_num}
select * from reservation where r_date=#{date} and f_num=#{f_num}

select r.r_num,r.id,r.f_num,f.f_name,r.time,r.r_date,r.total_price,m.phone from reservation r join member m ON r.id=m.id join field f ON f.f_num=r.f_num where r.id=#{s_id} and r_num=(select max(r_num) from reservation where r.id=#{s_id})
mapper.update: update reservation set status=#{status} where r_num=#{r_num}
